title: Bandai Namco Amusement America Namco Pac Man Air Hockey Table Game
features: FULL SIZED AIR HOCKEY - New from Namco - Full Size Pac-Man Stylized Air Hockey Table
PAC MAN SOUND EFFECTS - Games Makes 'Waka-Waka' Sound When Puck Hits the Sides of the Table
GREAT FOR BARS AND HOME GAME ROOMS - Perfect Addition to Any Arcade or Home Game Room
LED LIGHTING - Full Motion LED Lighting Below Playfield
FAMILY FRIENDLY FUN - Great Fun That's Enjoyable to All Ages
description: Namco Pac-Man Air Hockey Game- Air hockey meets Pac-Man with this new addition from Namco! The Pac-man home Air Hockey brings all the fun of arcade air hockey to the home rec-room. Full motion LED lighting below the playfield makes a great attraction. They light up red or blue to let everyone know who has scored. Pac-man music and sound effects add to the fun. Made to the same standards our arcade games are made to. A must for every rec-room.
